website_summaries.verdict: These professional-grade stilts are surprisingly popular as supports for oversize Halloween costumes, but they perform well for commercial purposes, too.
pros: Easy to assemble, with no tools required for adjustments
Minimal muscle fatigue after extended use
cons: Reports of rivets shearing off unexpectedly

customer_reviews.title: Great stilts, always check for loose bolts.
customer_reviews.text: I use these for big costumes for Halloween - which is NOT their intended purpose. That aside, they work great. I've spent hours on them walking around scaring people at haunted houses. One thing to keep an eye out for is to always check all the nuts and bolts every time you wear them. It says this in the paperwork, but you really need to do it. The one time I didn't, a bolt came loose and I ended up falling. I wasn't hurt, but it was hugely inconvenient. They are also super useful for putting up/taking down holiday lights. None of this is what they are intended for.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: I still managed to scare the crap out of kids with an 8' Grim reaper costume
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a halloween costume. They take some time to get used to but i'm about 250lbs and not very athletic. I still managed to scare the crap out of kids with an 8' Grim reaper costume. Oh yeah, you might be able to hang drywall with these too. The stinkbug method off a high chair was the best results for getting upright.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Did the job
customer_reviews.text: I am not a drywall contractor and this was my first experience with drywall stilts. The instructions could have been better. I had to make a few on-going adjustments to the heel stop and upper support to get the most comfortable fit. I only weigh 140 lbs. so they are plenty sturdy for me. By the time I had finished the job, the metal pieces clamped to the end of all 4 of the shoe straps had come off so I hope the ends don’t fray. In the end it did the job for me and for the price I can’t complain.
customer_reviews.author: Roderick Hixson

customer_reviews.title: seem to be having a problem with rivets shearing off ...
customer_reviews.text: seem to be having a problem with rivets shearing off on several pair of these we have. seem to be cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: and comfortable. I wore them for 6 or 7 hours ...
customer_reviews.text: I also bought these for a Halloween costume, with almost no experience with stilts. Luckily they're very stable, and comfortable. I wore them for 6 or 7 hours at one party. I bought them 4 years ago. I still get them out from time to time for odd jobs around the house, or if someone needs to borrow them, and they're still in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Dauenhauer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product & fun to use
customer_reviews.text: We puchased these for a production of Spamalot for the Knight who says Ni. It was a 15 year old girl, in our case, and while they took some getting used to and the correct footwear, she did mange to make them work. We are a theatre company and will find them useful for other roles and technical work in set construction and lighting use.
customer_reviews.author: Salvatore P. Salerno

customer_reviews.title: Halloween costume accessory
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my husband 's Halloween costume. He has experience using the stilts, but it had been a long time. No worries! He was able to walk easily on them and his Frankenstein costume was the hit of the party. I don't understand the problems some people had with set up. I had no problem and I had never used them before.
customer_reviews.author: L. Butcher

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very dissatisified with the quality of these products. We have had several pair break and especially while our employees were on them using for work. Through the event of one pair breaking, one of our workers fell off and broke his rib. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lucero

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Is a good product unfortunately I'm to old and unstable to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Randall E.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use with a halloween costume, ran around for a week on them on grass to practice and then for hours on halloween. Very stable nice flex, makes waling fairly natural.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what they say
customer_reviews.text: Had no problems with these stilts. Very useful for working in areas where moving ladders and benches constantly just won't do. Great for ceiling work like drywall installation, painting, and caulking. First pair of stilts and I don't have any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great stilts! They hold up well. Should last for many years.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: This item is really useful, for more than just fixing sheet rock in ...
customer_reviews.text: This item is really useful, for more than just fixing sheet rock in high places. It has helped me achieve heights to work on various art projects and they are pretty stable to walk with.
customer_reviews.author: Aiden McGhee

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: If you are not scared of hieghts then these work great. Bought them for doing drywall. Blind guys are so lucky! they save millions of dollars by going out with ugly chicks.
customer_reviews.author: Built For Speed Design

customer_reviews.title: Tall man walking.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for Halloween. Walked over a mile in them. No problems. Other kids loved that I was so tall. Easy to put on, wear good solid boots and socks. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Jacky & Phil

customer_reviews.title: Very nice item
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time and easy to put together. Reasonable price and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Ward

customer_reviews.title: High rising.
customer_reviews.text: These are great and uplifting. Just as described and are good quality construction. Look forward to using these for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: adkcub

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy to use and stable...
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of Stilts!! Excellently made product. Easy to use and stable. These Stilts deliver!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alan W

customer_reviews.title: works good
customer_reviews.text: They are a bit tricky to walk in but should serve the purpose for my Halloween costume. Now time to practice.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I am remodeling an old row home and they have been very helpful worked well easy to use no problems
customer_reviews.author: Sal Roberts

customer_reviews.title: While I was hopeful I would like them enough to make life easier painting or working ...
customer_reviews.text: I've never been on stilts before. I bought them to try out walking in stilts. While I was hopeful I would like them enough to make life easier painting or working drywall; I did not the fit or feel. I will give them a whirl again once I have more time to get to use to them. They appear to be well made, light weight and durable. Short of buying another brand, which was 3 times as much, these were the right price to try out. Just like everything else, I think they will take some getting use to.
customer_reviews.author: ShaneG

customer_reviews.title: KICK ASS!!
customer_reviews.text: these things are so epic!! best price ever and they are solid.
customer_reviews.author: I.MAKE.FAT.LOOK.GOOD!!

customer_reviews.title: Stilts work well
customer_reviews.text: When assembling the stilts, one bolt snapped (not even to the tight point), but otherwise the stilts work well. Happy.
customer_reviews.author: delsolcruz

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price but only for use on flat ground.
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for the few jobs I have around the house. I hope they make replacement straps for these because if they are used heavily it appears that they will wear out. I made the mistake of trying to see who was at the upstairs door by stepping out the back onto a small slope. Not being very used to them I quickly found myself looking around to see if anyone saw me fall. I wasn't hurt just embarrassed. Don't try it or you'll be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't imagine needing to pay more!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what a deal! Don't hesitate buying these! My first project was to cut-in with a 9' ceiling and what would have taken me 2+ hours with a ladder (and a much worse job!) took only 30 minutes. They worked perfectly. After adjusting the "ankle" springs, I could walk with confidence. I regret not having bought these a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: JetJock

customer_reviews.title: Great time saving investment
customer_reviews.text: I bought these stilts to do electrical work on 10 ft ceilings. I put them on and right away I was up and going on them. They are easy to get used to and save alot of time. I use them multiple times a week and have not had any trouble with them.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty Van Winkle

customer_reviews.title: for my first set I could not be happier and for the price you can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: This product is as described. Very solid, for my first set I could not be happier and for the price you can't go wrong. Very happy and would order again
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Lower strut rod didn't feel snug enough at bottom. ...
customer_reviews.text: Lower strut rod didn't feel snug enough at bottom.bolt. Made shim out of washer in order to make it safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: extremely hard to use.
customer_reviews.text: If your not a proffessional, you will find these hard to use. I thought they would be much, much easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. They're a little squeaky but I'm usually listening ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. They're a little squeaky but I'm usually listening to music. A good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: david dallago

customer_reviews.title: I bought these and they worked great. They are not the high end ones but ...
customer_reviews.text: Having never used stilts before, I bought these and they worked great. They are not the high end ones but work great for the price
customer_reviews.author: Larry Finnegan

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was simple and quality is ideal. I'm 6ft ...
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was simple and quality is ideal. I'm 6ft tall working on 8ft ceilings and these performed as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: These turned out to be exactly what I wanted. I'm a professional handyman but do not do a lot of drywall so I didn't want to spend a lot. I have done drywall before with moving ladders and planks. These work great and a good price. I had read a review on these that said it is difficult when working alone when you drop something (true)but my wife suggested getting one of those arm extenders and keep it where I could reach it, so for $5 I was able to pick up my taping knife with ease after dropping it. She is so smart.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Maly

customer_reviews.title: they are great and for a great price delivery was fast I ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my husband to use at work and he loves them.. they are great and for a great price delivery was fast I will order more in future
customer_reviews.author: melisa

customer_reviews.title: it's Silver not yellow!
customer_reviews.text: Silver not yellow. very difficulty to assemble and use. Aluminum is such soft metal and key parts are aluminum and easy to over tighten. It's hard to balance on and not terribly easy to adjust. Read return policy- you loose quite a bit of $ and also in shipping.
customer_reviews.author: pet person

customer_reviews.title: Love the Stilts!
customer_reviews.text: If I chose a low rating it was an accident. I'm very happy with the Drywall Stilts. No complaints! I'm new to the Stilts product.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Fowler

customer_reviews.title: these  are worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: just remember to tighten down all the nuts after you adjust them for you. quick to learn super useful love em
customer_reviews.author: Chris Reyno

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these because it gets real old going up and down ladders when painting and finishing drywall. These are really premo for the money. Plenty of adjustments and sturdy built. Excellent service from Amazon as always. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Gary G. Cline

customer_reviews.title: Excellent stilts
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. Very well made & easy to attach and use. Reason for not giving 5 stars is because the calf strap isn't attached to thet stilts very well. Not a safety risk at all, but more a convenience issue. The strap passes through a slot on the calf brace, but nothing holds it there when its loose(not being used). Thus it can easily(and it does) fall out. Again-when its secured to your leg, its very secure. The issue is when its NOT secured, such as when you're carrying them to a jobsite. The strap tends to fall out rather easily. Seems like it would be an easy fix to secure it somehow. Great product otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: GadgetGuy

customer_reviews.title: Sort of uncomfortable but for the price they were a great value
customer_reviews.text: They make you feel like you are walking bow legged They sort of tilt inward s s s s ss
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have had for a few years. Takes practice. work very well
customer_reviews.author: David yee

customer_reviews.title: These stilts are great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to adjust, and easy to learn to walk in. After about 20 minutes walking around in the house, I took them for a road trip. Freaked my neighbors out a bit, but had no problem walking up and down the street, driveways, curbs, etc. The pads on the bottom show very little wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Working man.
customer_reviews.text: For the price you cant beat these however id be willing to pay a little more to see Made In America on them.
customer_reviews.author: chad Adrian Mccleery

customer_reviews.title: no
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews that people were able to get up and running in these in no time.. no just no. My balance isnt the best, but damn, when i stood on these i thought i was going to die. I tried a couple different times and fell once. I bought these for a halloween costume, but quickly realizing I would kill myself, i sold them on craigslist for a fraction of the cost. Im sure they are usable with a lot of time to practice, but even still i wouldnt use these to walk for a night. To walk across a room while painting maybe, but dont expect them to have any other uses.
customer_reviews.author: S. Slack

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF
customer_reviews.text: NOT, I repeat, NOT waterproof. Which translates to NOT useable. Still works. Just can't see anything.
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM KEY

product_meta.title: Pentagon Tool Professional 18"-30" Silver Drywall Stilts Highest Quality
product_meta.description: 1115 Pentagon Tool Professional 18"-30" Silver Drywall Stilts Highest Quality
